an6.4:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an6.4:1.3: Saddhabalena, viriyabalena, satibalena, samadhibalena, pannabalena, asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an6.4:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
